Description: Depends on the business requirements for identifying priorities for CHC, GEM, EU, DB 1/2/3/4 For example, priority 1 countries for Diabetes will be in EU DB1
Region classification as per Sanofi definition
Business geographic segmentation as per Sanofi definition - sub-regions
Multi countries organization - group of countries based on BU requirements
Last intermediary between Manufacturer and the final user: where the patient get the product, e.g.; Retail, Hospital
Sanofi Market description: 6 levels of categories (Category 0 is the more granular) , detailed in 'Market Definition' section
Note: For CHC, we have only 2 levels : Master category & sub category

Description: Split into the three existing types of mode of delivery which are disposables, cartridges and vials for all Diabetes injectable products (GLP-1, FRC, Rapid, Premix, Basal)
Level of granularity specific to a category according to business needs

Split on specific Multinational Corporations (MNC) or others Multinational Corporations (Others MNCs) For example, at a global level, the list of MNCs includes mainly Astrazeneca, Bristol-Myers SQB, Glaxosmithkline, Johnson & Johnson, Lilly, Merck & Co, Merck KGAA, Novartis, Pfizer, Sanofi At a global level, the list of Others MNCs includes mainly Aspen, Bayer, Mylan, Takeda, etc.
International corporations cleaned, mapped and regrouped For example, the local corporation called 'Genzyme corp' will be harmonized at an international leval as 'Sanofi'
Product grouping defined by the name of the molecule
Note: For CHC, another segmentation is applied : product family and product name

Description: Product grouping defined by the name of the family brand or the name of the product or the generic
Product grouping defined by the name of the product or the generic. This dimension can be used if products have different names in the countries or if several products exist

Classification according to the IMS definition of a parallel Import/non parallel import (PI or no PI status) products. For example, Germany imports drugs from others countries, then this products will be marked as PI
